title: Team Icon Tier 2 upgrade not in hextech crafting
body:
So i bought the TSM Team Icon from the Shop and never received the tier 2 upgrade for it... I have pictures showing everything. I have never made a post before but here are the other 2 pictures. https://gyazo.com/92e0c5a37f5df80a0ee6b0a427ac4f4b 
https://gyazo.com/bc2040aa7759df6e679952c8f9bdf52b

replies.body: It looks like there was an issue where you obtained the icon but the store didn't take the RP cost (the account has a balance of 6) and provide the upgrades.  I've removed the icon from the account so you should be able to try again with the purchase going through this time once you have enough balance.  Let me know if the issue persists!
